components.HelpModal.AccessMaticMarketHe: How to access the Radiant Polygon Market

Radiant Polygon Market is the Radiant Protocol market on Polygon Network (L2). Here you have access to similar assets as in the main Radiant Market, but with lower transaction costs as you are using a L2 network.
Adding Polygon Mainnet is easy, please follow these steps
components.HelpModal.CollateralHelpModal: Adding and removing assets as collateral
Allows you to decide whether to use a deposited asset as collateral. An asset used as collateral will affect your borrowing power and health factor.
components.HelpModal.HealthFactorHelpMod: The health factor represents the safety of your loan derived from the proportion of collateral versus amount borrowed. Keep it above 1 to avoid liquidation.
Set up a notification when your health factor is getting low.
components.HelpModal.LiquidationBonusHel: When a liquidation occurs, liquidators repay part or all of the outstanding borrowed amount on behalf of the borrower. In return, they can buy the collateral at a discount and keep the difference as a bonus for maintaining a helathy debt-to-collateral ratio for the protocol.
components.HelpModal.LiquidationThreshol: This represents the threshold at which a borrow position will be considered undercollateralized and subject to liquidation for each collateral. For example, if a collateral has a liquidation threshold of 80%, it means that the loan will be liquidated when the debt value is worth 80% of the collateral value.
components.HelpModal.LoopHelpModal.descr: If lacking sufficient dLP for emissions eligibility, the loop function converts borrowed ETH to dLP to maintain minimum requirements
components.HelpModal.MaxLTVHelpModal.des: The Maximum Loan-to-Value ratio represents the maximum borrowing power of a specific collateral. For example, if a collateral has a LTV of 75%, the user can borrow up to 0.75 worth of ETH in the principal currency for every 1 ETH worth of collateral.
components.HelpModal.NotHaveEnoughFundsT: You don’t have enough funds in your wallet to repay the full amount. If you proceed to repay with your current amount of funds, you will still have a small borrowing position in your dashboard.
components.LTVInfoModal.liquidationOverv: Details about your Loan to Value (LTV) ratio and liquidation.

modules.arb-airdrop.flowSteps.step1Descr: On March 13th, 2023, Radiant DAO received 3M+ ARB tokens from the Arbitrum Foundation, of which the DAO elected to allocate 40% as an incentive to reward NEW long-term dLP lockers on Arbitrum and BNB Chain.
modules.arb-airdrop.flowSteps.step1Title: Radiant DAO will airdrop 1,339,210 ARB tokens to NEW 6 and 12 month dLP lockers.
modules.arb-airdrop.flowSteps.step2Descr: Claim your tokens using the button below.

(A 3% fee will incur upon each compound event)
modules.manage-radiant.components.Conten: Early withdrawal from a vest will incur a penalty between 25-90% based on a linear schedule of elapsed time.
RDNT earned from lending and borrowing must vest for 90 days.
RDNT that has completed the 90 day vesting period.
Automatically relock expired dLP for your default lock length of {duration}

modules.manage-radiant.components.Disqua: To claim bounties, you must hold a minimum of {balance}, have deposits, and be eligible for emissions.
modules.manage-radiant.components.Manage: RDNT rewards can be vested for 3 months to receive the full amount. While vesting, you earn 50% of platform revenue from borrowers paying interest. You can always exit early from a vest for a 50% penalty.
modules.markets.components.MarketTopCont: Calculated from protocol fees generated from borrowing interest and liquidations, which are distributed to dLP lockers. Locking APR differs chain by chain.
Borrowing interest, liquidations & flash loan fees are distributed to Dynamic Liquidity Providers
The price of RDNT directly affects the APR for Locking and Pool2.
Combined dollar value of all non-native assets within the Radiant ecosystem (BTC/ETH/USDC/DAI/USDT).
modules.migration.components.MigrationCl: I’ve claimed my protocol fees from v1 and I’m ready to continue.
You must claim all of your earned Radiant v1 platform fees.
modules.migration.components.MigrationCo: It’s easy to make dLP. Just enter any amount of RDNT and ETH from your wallet and Radiant will automatically balance the assets to meet the required 80/20 ratio.
this is the only place where it’s possible to deposit v1 RDNT into dLP.
Enter how much v1 RDNT you’d like to deposit.
Enter how much ETH you’d like to deposit.
Borrow ETH against your collateral assets to maximize the dLP.
It’s a Balancer-generated liquidity pool token composed of 80% RDNT and 20% ETH.
dLP is a unique approach to liquidity provisioning that’s designed to reduce impermanent loss and slippage for RDNT buyers and sellers.
Provide liquidity by locking dLP and earn protocol fees from deposits, borrows, and liquidations. Lock dLP for longer to earn a higher APR multiplier.
We’re introducing a new DeFi primitive called Dynamic Liquidity Provisioning (dLP).
Unlock the full potential of Radiant v2
When your total dLP locked is equivalent to 5% of your deposited collateral assets, you become eligible for RDNT emissions.
For example: lock a minimum of {dlpMinimum} in dLP and you could earn up to
you risk losing eligibility if the value of your dLP falls below the 5% minimum.
Supercharge your APR with RDNT emissions
